name: Goodnight [Visual novel]
description:
Synopsis:
These events happened in the places where any crime is nonsense. A quiet resort town is struck with panic; in broad daylight at the same time three children disappeared in nowhere: a brother and sisters Boucher. Valuable time is spent on searches that don’t give any visible results. The case receives wide publicity and achieves the great public impact. A young detective Jim Rene is the closest to the key of a mystery. But what’s the price of it? It's time to strive, to seek, to find, and not to yield.Features:
  • Goodnight is a kinetic visual novel in rare genre of neo-noir psychological thriller inspired by films like Blue Velvet, Se7en, Insomnia etc.
  • Animated backgrounds.
  • Anime style HD graphics (1280x720).
  • Atmospheric and exciting story.
  • Great music composed by Myuu.
  • Trading cards, Steam achievements.
